grading_explanation.relevance: 1.0/2 – The candidate has a Bachelor of Science in Data Science with skills in machine learning, deep learning, and programming. Although he doesn't have work experience as an AI, ML engineer or data scientist, his projects and achievements align well to these roles.

grading_debug.notes: Strengths: Strong project portfolio with relevant skills and significant achievements; Weaknesses: Limited work experience in the target role, potential need for more context regarding professional status.
